applicant-name.name: AMERICAN EXPRESS TRAVEL RELATED SERVICES COMPANY,INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR COLLABORATIVE FILTERING OF CARD MEMBER TRANSACTIONS

abstract.p: The disclosed system allows a credit or charge card issuer to provide its card members with a list of merchants, products, services, vacation destinations or other offerings that might be of interest based on the purchases of similar card members. In one instance, this process looks at all card members that made purchases at a merchant and then it identifies all other merchants in the same category where those card members also made purchases. The associated merchants are ranked based on largest number of shared card members and the top results may be shared with card members or merchants in order to enhance promotions, card use and marketing.

abstract.p: The disclosed method and system allows a credit or charge card issuer to provide its card members with a list of restaurants that might be of interes t based on the financial transactions of similar card members. In one instan ce, this method filters financial transaction data from a plurality of card members that involves a plurality of restaurants to generate a set of candid ate restaurant recommendations for a selected card member. This set of candi date restaurant recommendations is processed to yield a list of restaurant r ecommendations for the selected customer that is prioritized on the basis of the selected card member accepting the recommendation. The list of restaura nt recommendations is then reported to the selected card member to enhance c ard use and marketing.

applicant-name.name: AMERICAN EXPRESS TRAVEL RELATED SERVICES COMPANY,INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR PREDICTING CARD MEMBER SPENDING USING COLLABORATIVE FILTERING.
METODO PARA PRONOSTICAR LAS EROGACIONES DE UN AFILIADO A LA TARJETA UTILIZANDO EL FILTRADO CONJUNTO.

abstract.p: The disclosed method and system allows a credit or charge card issuer to provide its card members with a list of restaurants that might be of interest based on the financial transactions of similar card members. In one instance, this method filters financial transaction data from a plurality of card members that involves a plurality of restaurants to generate a set of candidate restaurant recommendations for a selected card member. This set of candidate restaurant recommendations is processed to yield a list of restaurant recommendations for the selected customer that is prioritized on the basis of the selected card member accepting the recommendation. The list of restaurant recommendations is then reported to the selected card member to enhance card use and marketing.

Se describe un método y sistema que permite a un emisor de crédito o de tarjeta de cargo proporcionar a sus afiliados a la tarjeta una lista de restaurantes que podría ser de interés con base en las transacciones financieras de afiliados a las tarjetas similares. En una instancia, este método filtra los datos de transacciones financieras de una pluralidad de afiliados a la tarjeta que involucra una pluralidad de restaurantes para generar un grupo de recomendaciones de restaurantes candidato para un afiliado a la tarjeta seleccionada. Este grupo de recomendaciones de restaurantes candidato se procesa para producir una lista de recomendaciones de restaurantes para un cliente seleccionado que se prioriza con base en el afiliado a la tarjeta seleccionado que acepta la recomendación.
La lista de recomendaciones de restaurante después se reporta al afiliado a la tarjeta seleccionada para mejorar el uso de la tarjeta y la comercialización.

This set of candidate restaurant recommendations is processed to yield a list of restaurant recommendations for the selected customer that is prioritized on the basis of the selected card member accepting the recommendation. The list of restaurant recommendations is then reported to the selected card member to enhance card use and marketing.

abstract.p: The disclosed method and system allows a credit or charge card issuer to provide its card members with a list of restaurants that might be of interest based on the financial transactions of similar card members. In one instance, this method filters financial transaction data from a plurality of card members that involves a plurality of restaurants to generate a set of candidate restaurant recommendations for a selected card member. This set of candidate restaurant recommendations is processed to yield a list of restaurant recommendations for the selected customer that is prioritized on the basis of the selected card member accepting the recommendation. The list of restaurant recommendations is then reported to the selected card member to enhance card use and marketing.

procédé pour prévoir LES dépenseS d'un porteur de carte utilisant un filtrage collaboratif

abstract.p: The disclosed method and system allows a credit or charge card issuer to provide its card members with a list of restaurants that might be of interest based on the financial transactions of similar card members. In one instance, this method filters financial transaction data from a plurality of card members that involves a plurality of restaurants to generate a set of candidate restaurant recommendations for a selected card member. This set of candidate restaurant recommendations is processed to yield a list of restaurant recommendations for the selected customer that is prioritized on the basis of the selected card member accepting the recommendation. The list of restaurant recommendations is then reported to the selected card member to enhance card use and marketing.

L'invention concerne un procédé et un système permettant à un émetteur de carte de crédit ou de carte bancaire de communiquer à ses porteurs de cartes une liste de restaurants qui peuvent être intéressants sur la base des transactions financières de porteurs de cartes similaires. Dans un cas, ce procédé filtre des données de transactions financières parmi une pluralité de porteurs de cartes qui concernent une pluralité de restaurants pour générer un ensemble de recommandations de restaurants candidats pour un porteur de carte sélectionné. Cet ensemble de recommandations de restaurants candidats est traité pour produire une liste de recommandations de restaurants pour le client sélectionné qui est hiérarchisée en fonction de l'acceptation de recommandations par le porteur de carte sélectionné.
La liste de recommandations de restaurants est ensuite signalée au porteur de carte sélectionné pour améliorer l'utilisation et la commercialisation de la carte.

applicant-name.name: AMERICAN EXPRESS TRAVEL RELATED SERVICES COMPANY,INC,

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR PREDICTING CARD MEMBER SPENDING USING COLLABORATIVE FILTERING

La liste de recommandations de restaurants est ensuite signalée au porteur de carte sélectionné pour améliorer l'utilisation et la commercialisation de la carte.
